Parameters: boolean: Whether the zoom controls are visible.
onVisibilityChanged(boolean).Description: Called when the zoom controls' visibility changes.
onVisibilityChanged(boolean).history: Added in API level 4 Deprecated in API level 29

Parameters: boolean: The direction of the zoom: true to zoom in, false to zoom out.
onZoom(boolean).Description: Called when the owner view needs to be zoomed.
onZoom(boolean).history: Added in API level 4 Deprecated in API level 29

ClassDesc: Interface that will be called when the user performs an interaction that triggers some action, for example zooming.
